title: Bookplate design commission
content: I intend to commission a bookplate for my personal use and would be interest to get in touch with a designer who would be interested in this job for a fee. Any suggestions as to where to get started would be greatly appreciated.
author: garoux

comments.content:
As the designer I would ask for any motifs of special relevance to you first. Can be everything, from a favourite saint, animal, place or season …  
What books do you cherish? What are your subjects of interest, of reading?  
A design could be rather typographical or more pictorial. Any particular style preferred?  
If interested please contact me via the contact form of [www.signographie.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804021447/http:/www.signographie.de/ "www.signographie.de")
